name: stjude-cloud-theme
description: St. Jude Cloud Theme and Guidelines

scripts.css-compile-all: npm run css-compile-main && npm run css-compile-static-example
scripts.css-compile-main: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/stjude-cloud-theme.scss dist/css/stjude-cloud-theme.css
scripts.css-compile-static-example: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 static/scss/styles.scss static/css/styles.css

author: St. Jude
